member.name: T:WebAPI.Contracts.Errors.ApiErrorResponse
member.summary: Represents a standardized error response returned by an API, including error message, type, details, validation errors, and optional inner exception information.
member.remarks: Use this class to provide structured error information in API responses, enabling clients to handle errors consistently. The class supports representing general errors, validation errors, and nested exceptions for detailed diagnostics. Validation errors are included when input validation fails, and inner exceptions can be used to convey exception chains for debugging purposes.
Initializes a new instance of the ApiErrorResponse class with the specified error message.
member.param: The error message that describes the API error. Cannot be null.
